Package org.lgdcloudsim.network

package org.lgdcloudsim.network
  • Class
    Description
    AreaDelayManager
    AreaDelayManager manages the delay between the area where the user is located and the region where the data center is located.
    DcBwManager
    DcBwManager manages the bandwidth between the data centers.
    DelayDynamicModel
    DelayDynamicModel is an interface for the dynamic delay model.
    NetworkTopology
    NetworkTopology is an interface for the network topology.
    NetworkTopologyNull
    The null network topology.
    NetworkTopologySimple
    NetworkTopologySimple is a simple implementation of the network topology.
    RandomDelayDynamicModel
    RandomDelayDynamicModel is an implementation of the DelayDynamicModel interface.
    RegionDelayManager
    RegionDelayManager manages the delay between the regions where the data centers are located.
